featured.text: You may also get sick from playing video games, or looking through a microscope.
He immediately rushed to his microscope and examined the burrs attached on his pants—feeling a lightbulb moment coming on.

definition.zh_def: 顯微鏡，一種用於放大微小物體的光學儀器。
definition.en_def: A microscope is an optical instrument used to magnify small objects.
definition.example: The scientist used a microscope to examine the tiny details of the cell.
